title: Evaluation of alternative bases to TMAH for tissue extraction of ENMs from tissues prior to spICP-MS analysis
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,4309-4320
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00416G, Paper
Bahareh Sadeghalvad, Evan P. Gray
Engineered nanomaterials (ENMs) are used in various consumer and industrial products, including human and biological systems for diagnostic and therapeutic purposes.
